content:
From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
Dear Isabelle users,

as another follow-up to the Isabelle2019 release, there is now a release
of MMT 17.0.0 as Isabelle application or component. See the blog entry
https://sketis.net/2019/mmt-as-component-for-isabelle2019 --- it
includes pointers to current papers about Isabelle/MMT at the bottom.

Makarius
